# Shopping Cart System - Epic Overview

## 1. User Account Management
- Enable user registration and secure login/logout functionality.
- Support profile updates including password resets and email verification.
- Implement role-based access control for admin and customer users.

## 2. Product Catalog Management
- Allow admins to add, update, and remove products with images and descriptions.
- Categorize products for easier browsing and filtering.
- Support inventory tracking and stock level alerts.

## 3. Shopping Cart Operations
- Enable users to add, update, or remove items from their cart.
- Persist cart state across sessions for logged-in users.
- Display real-time pricing and quantity updates.

## 4. Checkout Process
- Guide users through a multi-step checkout flow (shipping, billing, review).
- Validate user input and provide error handling.
- Offer guest checkout option with minimal friction.

## 5. Payment Processing
- Integrate with third-party payment gateways (e.g., Stripe, PayPal).
- Handle payment authorization, capture, and refunds securely.
- Ensure PCI compliance and encrypt sensitive data.

## 6. Order Management
- Generate order summaries and confirmation receipts.
- Allow users to view order history and track status.
- Enable admins to update order status (e.g., shipped, delivered, canceled).

## 7. Notification Systems
- Send email confirmations for orders, shipping, and account changes.
- Support SMS or push notifications for real-time updates.
- Allow users to manage notification preferences.

## 8. Analytics and Reporting
- Track sales performance and product popularity.
- Generate reports on user behavior and conversion rates.
- Provide dashboards for admin insights and decision-making.

## 9. Customer Support Integration
- Embed live chat or ticketing system for user inquiries.
- Allow users to submit return or refund requests.
- Provide FAQ and help center access.

## 10. Security and Compliance
- Implement two-factor authentication for sensitive actions.
- Log user activity for auditing and monitoring.
- Ensure compliance with GDPR, CCPA, and other regulations.
